original_text: And David was greatly distressed, for the people spoke of stoning him, because all the people were bitter in soul, each for his sons and daughters. But David strengthened himself in the Lord his God.
korean_text: 백성들이 자녀들 때문에 마음이 슬퍼서 다윗을 돌로 치자 하니 다윗이 크게 다급하였으나 그의 하나님 여호와를 힘입고 용기를 얻었더라

sentences.original_text: for the people spoke of stoning him
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 백성이 그를 돌로 치려 하였음이라

sentences.original_text: because all the people were bitter in soul
each for his sons and daughters
But David strengthened himself in the Lord his God
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 다윗은 자기 하나님 여호와께 힘을 얻고
